DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate live feedback home-based exercise improve ability perform exercise prescribed time tension ( TUT ) per repetition compare feedback among adolescent patellofemoral pain . The hypothesis adolescent receive live feedback BandCizer™ mean TUT significantly closer prescribed TUT compare group receive feedback course intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Live Feedback Increase Adherence Adolescents With Patellofemoral Pain
DOC.criteria: 15 19 year age Anterior knee pain nontraumatic origin provoke least two follow activity : prolong sit bended knee kneel , squat , run , jump ascend descend stair Tenderness palpation peripatellar border Pain 6 week duration Worst pain previous week ≥ 30 mm 100 mm VAS Concomitant pain structure knee ( e.g . ligament , tendon cartilage ) , hip lumbar spine Previous knee surgery Patellofemoral instability
